TextBody:
Hi Brett,

Thank you for reaching out!

We need the following details about your current appliance:
-Is it on-premise or hosted on the cloud? If it is on the cloud, which one?
-On what OS version is it running?
-What EPP Server version is it?

Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
 www.endpointprotector.com

EPP server version is 5.9.4.0 currently.


Thanks,

Brett

TextBody:
Hi Brett,

In this case, the procedure is to migrate the data and settings from the old server to a new one.

- In order to share the latest EPP appliance with you, please provide your AWS Account ID and the Region.
- After our DevOps colleagues share the new appliance image, you have to install it, and then we will schedule a remote session to perform the migration procedure.

If there are any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
 www.endpointprotector.com

TextBody:
Hi Brett,

We have received the below update from our colleagues:

The latest Endpoint Protector AWS Image was shared with AWS AccountId 495130909850 in the us-west-2.

Please follow the instructions in the deployment manual for AWS in order to start the EPP Appliance: https://www.endpointprotector.com/resources#product-documentation

After you have installed the image on your end, please let us know so we can schedule a remote session to migrate.


Best Regards,
Iosif Muntean| Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
 www.endpointprotector.com

wrote:

> Hello Brett,
>
> I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00428202. We haven’t
> heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need
> assistance with this issue.
>
> If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please
> let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the
> ticket on my end.
>
> Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions.
> We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.
>
> *Ticket Number:* 00428202
> *Ticket Subject:* Need to upgrade appliance to a supported version OS
> version
> *Ticket Details:* The appliance we got for our initial setup is an
> unsupported version of Ubuntu. We are being asked by our internal security
> team to upgrade the base OS on the appliance or migrate to a new version.
> We don't know how to accomplish this since this is a virtual appliance and
> have no updates relating to the internal update mechanism in EPP.
>
> Thank you!
>
